channel.title: 华尔街日报
channel.description: 这是一个追踪华尔街日报news的种子

item.title: 现在是巴黎巧克力精品店的巅峰时刻。下次来巴黎时，您可以去这里品尝最美味的黑巧克力、原产地巧克力和奢华巧克力蛋糕。
item.description:
It's a peak moment for Paris's chocolate boutiques. The next time you visit, here's where to go for the best chocolat chaud, single-origin bonbons and extravagant éclairs. https://t.co/j0lPUJgLnI https://t.co/j0lPUJgLnI

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) February 23, 2024

item.title: 最近，纽约法院对唐纳德-特朗普的欺诈案做出了 3.55 亿美元的判决，这给这位前总统及其企业带来了一系列挑战。但从几个方面来看，法律诉讼才刚刚开始。以下是接下来的内容。
item.description:
The recent $355 million New York fraud ruling against Donald Trump presents a series of challenges for the former president and his business. But in several ways, the legal maneuvering is only beginning. Here’s what comes next. https://t.co/pRx7xgLgMs https://t.co/pRx7xgLgMs

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) February 23, 2024

item.title: 高尔夫球手塔洛-古奇（Talor Gooch）是第一批加入沙特支持的巡回赛的选手之一。现在，他计划用自己赢得的奖金来撼动骑牛运动。
item.description:
Golfer Talor Gooch was among the first wave of players to join the Saudi-backed circuit. Now he plans to use his winnings to shake up bull riding. https://t.co/yk8SurADch https://t.co/yk8SurADch

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) February 23, 2024

item.title: 泰勒-劳登（Tyler Loudon）在偷听到他的妻子（英国石油公司前高管）在家工作时讨论一项收购计划后，承认犯有内幕交易罪。他根据听到的细节进行股票交易，获利 176 万美元。
item.description:
Tyler Loudon pleaded guilty to insider trading after overhearing his wife, a former BP executive, discuss a planned acquisition while she was working from home. He made $1.76 million trading shares based on the details he heard. https://t.co/fQuaWZexzH https://t.co/fQuaWZexzH

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) February 23, 2024

item.title: @yarotrof写道：俄罗斯入侵乌克兰两年后，全世界都在关注美国是否继续致力于欧洲安全。
item.description:
Two years after Russia invaded Ukraine, the world is watching to see if the U.S. remains committed to European security, writes @yarotrof https://t.co/EsNu9slvRw https://t.co/EsNu9slvRw

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) February 23, 2024

item.title: 美国正在推动加拿大对墨西哥游客实施签证要求，旨在阻止北部边境非法越境人数的激增
item.description:
The U.S. is pushing Canada to impose visa requirements on Mexican visitors, aiming to stem a surge in illegal crossings at the northern border https://t.co/BKWSclFlNN https://t.co/BKWSclFlNN

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) February 23, 2024

item.title: 石油亿万富翁蒂姆-邓恩（Tim Dunn）自诩为激进的基督徒，他希望像撼动得克萨斯州共和党那样撼动全国共和党。他的任务是：延续特朗普时代的政策。
item.description:
Oil billionaire Tim Dunn, a self-described activist Christian, wants to shake up the national Republican Party much like he did the Texas one. The mission: to perpetuate Trump-era policies. https://t.co/r98l5lkVbS https://t.co/r98l5lkVbS

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) February 23, 2024

item.title: 来自@WSJopinion：英伟达的估值本质上是对美国私人创新的巨大赌注。请国会和拜登总统注意：产业政策不会使国家或企业变得伟大。
item.description:
From @WSJopinion: Nvidia’s valuation is essentially a giant bet on U.S. private innovation. Note to Congress and President Biden: Industrial policy doesn’t make countries or businesses great. https://t.co/obDhzJ3xp0

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) February 23, 2024

item.title: 一个学区花了五年多的时间和一百万美元的律师费来阻止一个家庭为其残疾女儿寻求更好的服务。此案为我们提供了一个窗口，让我们了解为解决特殊教育纠纷而进行的法律斗争的数量。
item.description:
One school district spent more than five years and $1 million in legal fees pushing back on a family seeking better services for a daughter with disabilities. The case offers a window into the number of legal fights to resolve special-education disputes. https://t.co/wStpcSCXYH

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) February 23, 2024

item.title: 爆炸性新闻英伟达的股市估值首次达到 2 万亿美元
item.description:
Breaking: Nvidia hit a $2 trillion stock-market valuation for the first time https://t.co/10iZMHJ8UI https://t.co/10iZMHJ8UI

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) February 23, 2024

item.title: 英伟达（Nvidia）的估值已接近 2 万亿美元。其执行人工智能计算的芯片价值不菲，甚至可以用装甲车运送。
item.description:
Nvidia’s valuation is closing in on $2 trillion. Its chips that perform AI calculations are so valuable that they are delivered in armored cars. https://t.co/AmCHDoJcUX https://t.co/AmCHDoJcUX

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) February 23, 2024

item.title: Meta 工作人员警告说，Facebook 和 Instagram 上新的付费订阅工具可能会剥削儿童。他们提出了降低滥用风险的建议。该公司却采取了另一种方法。
item.description:
Meta staff warned that new paid subscription tools on Facebook and Instagram enabled child exploitation. They offered suggestions to reduce risks of misuse. The company took another approach instead. https://t.co/CObdypG02a https://t.co/CObdypG02a

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) February 23, 2024

item.title: 巴西人完善了 "泥球"--在亚马逊河畔，在深及脚踝的泥浆中踢足球
item.description:
Brazilians have perfected “mudball”—soccer on the banks of the Amazon, ankle-deep in mud https://t.co/8hhbLRsNnG https://t.co/uCovFN0VRP

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) February 23, 2024

item.title: 越来越多的股票市场资深人士指责纳斯达克，因为仙股的交易量出现了巨大爆发
item.description:
A growing number of stock-market veterans are blaming Nasdaq as penny stocks experience huge bursts of trading volume https://t.co/vfwI1aSt7X https://t.co/vfwI1aSt7X

item.title: 如何解决世界上最严重的医生短缺问题之一，是医生和韩国政府之间摊牌的关键所在
item.description:
A showdown between physicians and South Korea’s government hinges on how to address one of the world’s worst doctor shortages https://t.co/cvwcJvj1RD https://t.co/cvwcJvj1RD

item.title: 观看：OpenAI 再次提高了生成式人工智能的标准，这次是在视频方面。下面我们就来看看你是如何检测这类视频的。
item.description:
Watch: OpenAI raised the bar again with what's possible in generative AI, this time with video. Here's a closer look at how you might be able to detect these kinds of videos. https://t.co/kwZtcwpExs https://t.co/kwZtcwpExs

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) February 23, 2024

item.title: 本赛季，美国职业棒球联盟（MLB）推出了本应融合尖端科技与时尚的新队服。然而，它们却引起了广泛的反响，还出现了一些相当尴尬的画面。
item.description:
The MLB unveiled new uniforms for this season that were supposed to blend cutting-edge tech with fashion. Instead, they’ve generated widespread backlash—and some rather embarrassing images. https://t.co/7GO5vcxo0G https://t.co/7GO5vcxo0G

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) February 23, 2024

item.title: 加沙战争使以色列士兵和后备役人员倍感压力，同时也再次激起了人们对几十年来以色列极端东正教犹太人豁免问题的长期怨恨
item.description:
The war in Gaza is straining Israel’s soldiers and reservists, and resurfacing long-held resentments over a decades-old exemption for the country’s ultra-Orthodox Jews https://t.co/j9SsoQRkoG https://t.co/j9SsoQRkoG

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) February 23, 2024

item.title: 忘掉年度绩效考核吧。在办公室里，为永不停歇的反馈让路吧。

item.title: 尼基-黑莉在家乡南卡罗来纳州的竞选活动比唐纳德-特朗普更卖力，但预计仍将处于第二位
item.description:
Nikki Haley is campaigning harder than Donald Trump in her home state of South Carolina, but is still expected to place a distant second https://t.co/2VxhPeV0P0 https://t.co/2VxhPeV0P0

item.title: 我们的专栏作家试驾特斯拉 Cybertruck 的规则很简单：没有规则。以下是他在 48 小时试驾过程中的对与错。
item.description:
The rules for our columnist’s test drive of Tesla’s Cybertruck were simple: no rules. Here’s what went right—and wrong—during his 48-hour test drive. https://t.co/4qB6Fk1RgR https://t.co/4qB6Fk1RgR

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) February 23, 2024

item.title: 过去几年，数十亿美元涌入多管理人公司，但很少有公司能与 Citadel、千禧年和 Point72 的成功相媲美。
item.description:
Billions of dollars have poured into multimanager firms in the past few years, but few have managed to match the success of Citadel, Millennium and Point72 https://t.co/U3LjzCvAJt https://t.co/U3LjzCvAJt

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) February 23, 2024

item.title: 虽然绝大多数退休人员都选择缩小规模，但也有一些空巢老人认为越大越好。以下是在决定永久居所的大小时需要考虑的因素。
item.description:
While a vast majority of retirees choose to downsize, some empty-nesters think bigger is better. Here’s what to consider when deciding on the size of your forever home. https://t.co/yrMFSCcofk https://t.co/yrMFSCcofk

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) February 23, 2024

item.title: 从同店销售到薪资福利，公司在财务报告中需要考虑的事项有很多，以延长二月份的时间
item.description:
From same-store sales to payroll benefits, there are many things for companies to consider in financial reporting for a longer February https://t.co/tGiKZRKKsI https://t.co/tGiKZRKKsI

item.title: 以色列总理本雅明-内塔尼亚胡（Benjamin Netanyahu）概述了一项战后加沙计划，该计划要求设置巴勒斯坦地方官员，沿边界维持一个缓冲区，并控制经由埃及的通道
item.description:
Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu outlined a plan for postwar Gaza that calls for installing local Palestinian officials, maintaining a buffer zone along its border and controlling access via Egypt https://t.co/eI098KlTwg https://t.co/eI098KlTwg

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) February 23, 2024

item.title: 街谈巷议：乌克兰入侵两周年之际，重要的能源运输走廊不断遭受袭击，油价却停留在和平时期
item.description:
Heard on the Street: On the second anniversary of the Ukraine invasion and amid ongoing attacks on a vital energy shipping corridor, the oil price is stuck in peacetime https://t.co/I4nPwzehLo https://t.co/I4nPwzehLo

item.title: 美国可能向乌克兰提供的数十亿美元援助被国会山搁置，而对于参加今年保守派政治行动会议的特朗普党派人士来说，这正是理所应当的。
item.description:
Billions in potential American aid to Ukraine is stuck in limbo on Capitol Hill, and to the Trump-loving partisans attending this year’s Conservative Political Action Conference that’s exactly as it should be https://t.co/8kvuwdFYX8 https://t.co/8kvuwdFYX8

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) February 23, 2024

item.title: FTX 财产已同意撤销一项诉讼，该诉讼旨在从破产的加密货币交易所欧洲分部的原始所有者那里收回至少 3.235 亿美元。
item.description:
The FTX estate has agreed to drop a lawsuit that sought to claw back at least $323.5 million from the original owners of the bankrupt cryptocurrency exchange’s European unit https://t.co/CeAOmIx5iW https://t.co/CeAOmIx5iW

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) February 23, 2024
